snippet.title: Clair Obscur: Expedition 33 Maelle Character Trailer - Future Games Show Spring Showcase 2025
snippet.description:
A character trailer for the upcoming turn-based RPG Clair Obscur: Expedition 33 introduced Maelle, a rapier-wielding survivor played by Jennifer English. It's coming to PC, PlayStation and Xbox on April 24th. 

https://www.youtube.com/@FutureGamesShow

#FutureGamesShow #FGS

Future Publishing uses the Epidemic Sound Library and Adobe Creative Cloud Generative AI features
